meanings.definition: A wall or partition designed to inhibit or prevent the spread of fire.
meanings.sent1: The firewalls in the building helped stop the fire from spreading to other rooms.
meanings.sent2: The firefighters quickly contained the blaze using the firewalls in the structure.
meanings.sent3: The firewalls were like brave soldiers standing guard against the flames.
meanings.sent4: The firewalls acted as a shield, protecting the building from the fiery threat.
meanings.sent5: The sturdy firewalls stood strong, blocking the path of the fire.

meanings.definition: A software or hardware system that protects a computer network from unauthorized access.
meanings.sent1: Installing firewalls on your computer can help keep hackers out of your system.
meanings.sent2: Many companies rely on firewalls to safeguard their sensitive data from cyber attacks.
meanings.sent3: The firewalls on the network were like digital gatekeepers, keeping intruders at bay.
meanings.sent4: The firewalls functioned as a virtual barrier, preventing unauthorized entry into the network.
meanings.sent5: The advanced firewalls were like digital bodyguards, defending the network from online threats.
